text: There are three ways that cancer spreads in the body.    - Cancer may spread from where it began to other parts of the body.    - The following stages are used for transitional cell cancer of the renal pelvis and/or ureter:         - Stage 0 (Papillary Carcinoma and Carcinoma in Situ)     - Stage I     - Stage II     - Stage III     - Stage IV        - Transitional cell cancer of the renal pelvis and ureter is also described as localized, regional, or metastatic:          - Localized     - Regio
